        deadband - Maximum value that returns zero
        value - Value to test
        Returns:
        Deadbanded value

        Returns if two double values are equal to within epsilon.
        Parameters:
        a - First value
        b - Second value
        Returns:
        True if the values are equal, false otherwise

      • equal

            double b,
            double distance)
        Returns if two double values are equal to within a distance.
        Parameters:
        a - First value
        b - Second value
        distance - Maximum distance between a and b
        Returns:
        True if the values are equal ot within distance, false otherwise

      • filter

        public static double filter(double value,
            double lastvalue,
            double fail)
        Ignores values equal to the fail value (normally zero).
        Parameters:
        value - Current value
        lastvalue - Previous value
        fail - Filter this value, normally zero
        Returns:
        Filtered value

            double max,
            double value)
        Forces a numerical value to be between a min and a max.
        Parameters:
        min - If less than min, returns min
        max - If greater than max, returns max
        value - Value to test
        Returns:
        Coerced value

      • inBounds

        public static boolean inBounds(double min,
               double max,
               double value)
        Tests if a number is between the bounds, exclusive.
        Parameters:
        min - If less than min, returns false
        max - If greater than max, returns false
        value - Value to test
        Returns:
        Returns true if value is between (exclusive) min and max, false otherwise.

      • distance

        public static double distance(double deltaX,
              double deltaY)
        Get the distance between two deltas
        Parameters:
        deltaX - Change in first variable
        deltaY - Change in second variable
        Returns:
        Distance formula, sqrt(dx^2 + y^2)

      • distance

              org.opencv.core.Point p2)
        Get the distance between two points
        Parameters:
        p1 - Point one
        p2 - Point two
        Returns:
        Distance formula, sqrt(dx^2 + dy^2)

        pt2 - Vector 2
        pt0 - Vector 0

      • normalPDF

        public static double normalPDF(double x,
               double variance,
               double meanValue)
        Calculate a normal probability density function (PDF) based on a variance and mean value
        Parameters:
        x - The location on the normal distribution. The location at the mean would be the largest value
        variance - The variance (stddev^2) of the normal distribution.
        meanValue - The mean value is the x location at which the function is the largest (i.e. has median)
        Returns:
        The normal distribution at the location x

      • normalPDFNormalized

        public static double normalPDFNormalized(double x,
                         double variance,
                         double meanValue)
        Calculate a normal probability density function (PDF) based on a variance and mean value in which the median value is equal to 1
        Parameters:
        x - The location on the normal distribution. The location at the mean would be the largest value
        variance - The variance (stddev^2) of the normal distribution.
        meanValue - The mean value is the x location at which the function is the largest (i.e. has median)
        Returns:
        The normal distribution at the location x
